title: League of Legends & Tft OCE Discord

embed.description: Check out the The Rift community on Discord - hang out with 226 other members and enjoy free voice and text chat.

body:
Hey guys I made this discord server in hopes of growing a decent sized community where you can meet & talk to people and play games with everyone, I will be doing give aways and will be hosting tournaments for league with unique roles as the server grows.

If you'd like to come join and help the community grow then feel free to join, everyone is welcome, thank you for your time.
